tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SpaceStationEnvironmentalData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE space_station (
    station_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    atmospheric_pressure DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    atmospheric_pressure DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES space_station(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE space_stations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_established DATE
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INTEGER REFERENCES space_stations (id),
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  air_pressure DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE research_analysis (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  data_id INTEGER REFERENCES environmental_data (id),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
  analysis_result TEXT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE space_stations (
    station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    crew_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2),
    pressure DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    assigned_scientist VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE project_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalReadings (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  humidity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  station_id INT REFERENCES SpaceStations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  research_topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  data TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  station_id INT REFERENCES SpaceStations(station_id)
);
